Vulnerability.Title: new packages: thunderbird
Vulnerability.Description: Mozilla Thunderbird is a standalone mail and newsgroup client. This enhancement update adds Mozilla Thunderbird to Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7. (BZ#1066045) All users who require Mozilla Thunderbird are advised to install these new packages. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
